name: FastMeasure
tag_list: distance-measuring-tool, measures-distance, distance-measuring-instrument, dmi, distance-measuring-device, measuring-wheel, distance-measuring-wheel
overview:
Time is money, FastMeasure distance measuring tool, a device that measures quickly and accurately.

FastMeasure allows contractors, estimators, foreman engineers and surveyors to measures parking lots, roadways, driveways, concrete curbs, and city sidewalks – even utilities like power lines, storm and sanitary sewers and gas lines.

Utilized by paving contactors, public utility companies and government agencies for asphalt sealcoating and striping jobs on parking lots.

FastMeasure, from KTP Enterprise installs in your car or truck and will accurately measure at slow, medium or highway speed.

FastMeasure is perfect for state, federal and local engineers, paving contractors, utility contractors, technicians, property managers and anyone who needs to save time while getting the job done efficiently.

The distance measuring wheel is outdated and can be inaccurate when measuring long distances. FastMeasure can be used as a vehicle-installed distance measuring instrument (DMI), a high tech, easy-to-use, and precise time saving device.

FastMeasure Our tools save you time and make you more productive. We’re making time in the future!
